dashboard.overview: Here's an overview of your legal assistance dashboard

search.placeholder: Search documents, appointments, or ask a question...

aiAssistant.title: Chat with AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Get instant legal guidance and document help

consultation.title: Schedule Consultation
consultation.description: Book time with a legal expert

chat.greeting: Hello! How can I assist you today?
chat.error: Sorry, there was an error processing your request.

onboarding.title: Legal Aid Assistant
onboarding.subtitle: Let's get you set up with personalized legal support

questions.language: Hi! I'm your legal assistant. Before we begin, please select your preferred language.
questions.date_of_birth: What is your date of birth? (MM/DD/YYYY)
questions.current_sf_resident: Are you currently a resident of San Francisco?
questions.household_size: How many people live in your household?
questions.annual_household_income: What is your total annual household income?
questions.has_past_due_rent: Do you have any past-due rent?
questions.cannot_afford_move_in_costs: Are you unable to afford move-in costs for a new rental?
questions.if_applying_for_back_rent_financial_hard: Have you experienced financial hardship in the last 12 months that affected your ability to pay rent?
questions.qualify_as_individual_or_family: Do you qualify as an individual or family according to HUD guidelines?
questions.head_of_household_minimum_age_or_emancip: Are you at least 18 years old or legally emancipated?
questions.annual_income_within_established_limits: Is your annual income within the established program limits?
questions.pass_criminal_background_check: Can you pass a criminal background check?
questions.ssn_documentation_provided_or_certified: Can you provide SSN documentation or certification?
questions.hud_citizenship_or_immigration_requireme: Do you meet HUD citizenship or eligible immigration status requirements?
questions.no_meth_production_conviction: Can you confirm you have no convictions for methamphetamine production?
questions.not_subject_to_sex_offender_registration: Can you confirm you are not subject to sex offender registration?
questions.no_outstanding_rent_debt: Do you have any outstanding rent debt?
questions.household_income_below_50_ami: Is your household income below 50% of the Area Median Income (AMI)?
questions.assistance_exception_if_receiving_assist: Are you currently receiving any other housing assistance?
questions.non_discrimination_policy: Do you agree to comply with our non-discrimination policy?
questions.photo_id: Do you have a valid government-issued photo ID?
questions.proof_of_total_household_income: Can you provide proof of total household income?
questions.rental_agreement_or_address_proof: Do you have a rental agreement or proof of address?
questions.proof_of_rent_amount: Can you provide proof of your rent amount?
questions.tenant_ledger: Do you have access to your tenant ledger?
questions.landlord_contact_info: Can you provide your landlord's contact information?
questions.w9_form: Can you provide a completed W-9 form?

onboarding.completion: Thanks! Your profile is all set. I'll take you to your dashboard now.
onboarding.invalidInput: Sorry, that doesn't seem to be valid. Please try again.
